hotspots.title: Task Columns
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Kanban board with Backlog → Active → Done flow.

**Why it matters:** Visual task tracking that syncs with Claude Tasks.

• Drag tasks between columns
• Auto-sync with Claude's task system
• Priority indicators + timestamps
• Evidence chain linking to worklogs

hotspots.title: Create Task
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** New task button.

**Why it matters:** Tasks drive the entire workflow.

• Creates tracked task with ID
• Links to checkpoints and worklogs
• Visible in desktop monitor

hotspots.title: Leader Terminal
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** The orchestrating agent's terminal.

**Why it matters:** Leader coordinates all worker agents.

• Receives high-level tasks
• Delegates to workers via inbox
• Monitors progress across all agents
• Full PTY with shell access

hotspots.title: Worker Terminals
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Worker agent terminals in grid.

**Why it matters:** Parallel execution with PTY bridge.

• Each worker has dedicated PTY
• Real-time output streaming
• Independent but coordinated
• Resizable grid layout

hotspots.title: Request/Response Traffic
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Real-time API traffic monitor.

**Why it matters:** Full observability of all LLM interactions.

• Request/response pairs
• Token counts + latency
• Filterable by agent/model
• Detailed payload inspection

hotspots.title: Orchestration View
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Agent orchestration timeline.

**Why it matters:** Understand multi-agent coordination.

• See leader/worker interactions
• Inbox message flow
• Task delegation patterns

hotspots.title: Quick Actions
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** System tray companion app.

**Why it matters:** Always-available shortcuts.

• Screenshot capture
• Quick task creation
• Session status at a glance
• One-click recording start

hotspots.title: Status Indicators
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Live status information.

**Why it matters:** Know what's happening at a glance.

• Active agents count
• Recording status
• Gateway connection
• LMStudio status

hotspots.title: Desktop App (Electron)
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** The Kuroryuu desktop application.

**Why it matters:** Your command center.

• React + Electron frontend
• Multi-pane workspace
• Real-time updates via IPC
• Offline-capable

hotspots.title: Gateway (FastAPI)
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** FastAPI gateway service.

**Why it matters:** Single entry point, auth + routing.

• Single-user auth (hackathon POC)
• Routes to MCP_CORE
• WebSocket support
• Local-first design

hotspots.title: MCP_CORE
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Model Context Protocol core.

**Why it matters:** Tool registry + permissions.

• 40+ registered tools
• Permission management
• Tool routing
• Kuroryuu MCP server
